title: primitive
description: Geometry to be rendered with the given material.

attributes.description: A dictionary object of strings, where each string is the ID of the accessor containing an attribute.

indices.description: The ID of the accessor that contains the indices.
indices.gltf_detailedDescription: The ID of the accessor that contains the indices.  When this is not defined, the primitives should be rendered without indices using `drawArrays()`.  When defined, the accessor must contain indices: the bufferView referenced by the accessor must have a target equal to 34963 (ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER); a byteStride that is tightly packed, i.e., 0 or the byte size of componentType in bytes; componentType must be 5121 (UNSIGNED_BYTE) or 5123 (UNSIGNED_SHORT); and type must be "SCALAR".

material.description: The ID of the material to apply to this primitive when rendering.

mode.description: The type of primitives to render.
mode.gltf_detailedDescription: The type of primitives to render. All valid values correspond to WebGL enums.
